title: Rebel angel
creator_credit: John Read, BBC-TV and RM Productions
brief_description: A documentary made to celebrate the bicentenary of the birth of British painter, J.M.W. Turner. It brings together Turner’s sketchbooks, watercolors, oil paintings and the actual locations where he painted, into a comprehensive account of the diverse nature of his creativity. Suitable for secondary and tertiary levels.
